Posts.EditableText: It looks like all of 2010's games released on textadventures.co.uk (except the Sandpit ones) have been listed at http://xyzzyawards.org/ for this year's awards, so you can vote for them if you wish. So if any of 2010's additions have particularly impressed you, go ahead and vote!
Posts.HTML: It looks like all of 2010's games released on textadventures.co.uk (except the Sandpit ones) have been listed at http://xyzzyawards.org/ for this year's awards, so you can vote for them if you wish. So if any of 2010's additions have particularly impressed you, go ahead and vote!
